value.description:
Specify the characters of the bullet that you expect to interpret as a list. It expects an array of code points. Default value is [Bullets](https://github.com/markuplint/markuplint/blob/main/packages/%40markuplint/rules/src/use-list/index.ts#L11-L52).

It executes after decoding character references to be a code point. For example, it decodes `"•"` to be `"•"`. **Note: You must specify a code point instead of the character reference you need.** It supports the surrogate pair code points.

spaceNeededBullets.description: Bullets that require space to detect as a list item.
